channel.description: Recent content in meta on Quentin Baker

item.title: Introductions
item.description: A new new new (new?) Blog Randall Munroe, among others, has noted the chronic problem of content producers who can’t commit. I’m not going to try and promise I’ll post a lot, or even that this blog won’t go stale, disappear, and maybe be replaced by yet another in 2 years – history shows this is likely. I do hope you find something interesting here that tickles your mind and causes you to stop and ponder, if only for a moment.
